processUnidirectionalShutdown(Socket) - Method in class server.playerHandlers.GameCommunicationHandler
Stores that the shutDownStarter socket has received a close notification (other end has closed its output) and that the other end of the other player's socket has been notified that the communication has ended (by closing its output) And if it detects that both ways communications have finished, it closes the sockets.
